mapper.select: SELECT o.sales_out_code sales_out_code , p.prod_name prod_name , a.act_name act_name , o.sales_out_amt sales_out_amt , o.sales_out_date sales_out_date , i.sales_in_exd sales_in_exd , i.prod_save_amt prod_save_amt FROM sales_out o JOIN com_prod p ON (o.prod_code = p.prod_code) JOIN com_act a ON (o.act_code = a.act_code) JOIN sales_in i ON (o.prod_code = i.prod_code) ORDER BY sales_out_code DESC
SELECT act_code, act_name, find_cdnm('0J',act_sts) act_sts, find_cdnm('ACT-TYPE',act_kind) act_kind FROM com_act WHERE act_kind = 'ACT-TYPE1' AND ACT_STS = 'D1' ORDER BY act_code DESC
SELECT prod_code, prod_name, prod_unit, prod_std FROM com_prod WHERE prod_kind = 'C' ORDER BY prod_code DESC

SELECT o.sales_out_code sales_out_code, p.prod_name prod_name, o.prod_code prod_code, o.prod_lot prod_lot, o.act_code act_code, o.emp_code emp_code, e.emp_name emp_name, a.act_name act_name, o.sales_out_amt sales_out_amt, o.sales_out_date sales_out_date, i.sales_in_exd sales_in_exd, o.sales_ord_de_code sales_ord_de_code, i.prod_save_amt prod_save_amt, r.sales_rt_code sales_rt_code FROM sales_out o JOIN com_prod p ON ( o.prod_code = p.prod_code ) JOIN com_act a ON ( o.act_code = a.act_code ) JOIN sales_in i ON ( o.prod_lot = i.prod_lot ) JOIN sales_ord_de d ON ( o.sales_ord_de_code = d.sales_ord_de_code ) JOIN com_emp e ON ( o.emp_code = e.emp_code ) left JOIN sales_rt r ON ( o.sales_out_code = r.sales_out_code)
AND a.act_code LIKE '%' || #{actCode} || '%'
AND p.prod_code LIKE '%' || #{prodCode} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(o.sales_out_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{startDate}
AND TO_CHAR(o.sales_out_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{endDate}
AND d.dev_yn != 'N'
AND d.dev_yn != 'Y'
ORDER BY sales_out_code DESC

SELECT o.sales_out_code sales_out_code, p.prod_name prod_name, o.prod_code prod_code, o.prod_lot prod_lot, o.act_code act_code, o.emp_code emp_code, e.emp_name emp_name, a.act_name act_name, o.sales_out_amt sales_out_amt, o.sales_out_date sales_out_date, i.sales_in_exd sales_in_exd, o.sales_ord_de_code sales_ord_de_code, i.prod_save_amt prod_save_amt, r.sales_rt_code sales_rt_code FROM sales_out o JOIN com_prod p ON ( o.prod_code = p.prod_code ) JOIN com_act a ON ( o.act_code = a.act_code ) JOIN sales_in i ON ( o.prod_lot = i.prod_lot ) JOIN sales_ord_de d ON ( o.sales_ord_de_code = d.sales_ord_de_code ) JOIN com_emp e ON ( o.emp_code = e.emp_code ) LEFT JOIN sales_rt r ON ( o.sales_out_code = r.sales_out_code) ORDER BY sales_out_code DESC
SELECT i.*, p.prod_name FROM sales_in i JOIN com_prod p ON (i.prod_code = p.prod_code) WHERE prod_save_amt > 0 ORDER BY prod_lot DESC

SELECT i.prod_lot, i.prod_code, p.prod_name, i.sales_in_date, i.sales_in_amt, i.prod_save_amt, i.sales_in_exd FROM sales_in i JOIN com_prod p ON (i.prod_code = p.prod_code)
WHERE prod_name LIKE '%' || #{prodName} || '%'
AND prod_save_amt < 1 ORDER BY i.prod_lot DESC

SELECT d.sales_ord_de_code sales_ord_de_code , o.ord_date ord_date , a.act_code act_code , a.act_name act_name , o.ord_sts ord_sts , p.prod_name prod_name , d.prcs_rq_amt prcs_rq_amt , d.dev_date dev_date , d.dev_yn dev_yn , e.emp_code , e.emp_name , r.prcs_dir_sts FROM sales_ord o JOIN sales_ord_de d ON (o.ord_code = d.ord_code) JOIN com_prod p ON (d.prod_code = p.prod_code) JOIN com_act a ON (o.act_code = a.act_code) JOIN prcs_dir r ON (o.prcs_plan_code = r.prcs_plan_code) JOIN com_emp e ON (o.emp_code = e.emp_code) LEFT JOIN sales_out t ON (d.sales_ord_de_code = t.sales_ord_de_code) WHERE d.dev_yn = 'N' AND o.ord_sts = 'P2' AND r.prcs_dir_sts = 'P3' AND t.sales_out_code IS NULL ORDER BY o.ord_date, d.sales_ord_de_code DESC

SELECT prod_code, prod_name, prod_unit, prod_std FROM com_prod
WHERE prod_name LIKE '%' || #{prodName} || '%'
AND prod_kind = 'C' ORDER BY prod_code DESC

SELECT act_code, act_name, find_cdnm('0J',act_sts) act_sts, find_cdnm('ACT-TYPE',act_kind) act_kind FROM com_act
WHERE act_name LIKE '%' || #{actName} || '%'
AND act_kind = 'ACT-TYPE1' ORDER BY act_code DESC

SELECT d.sales_ord_de_code sales_ord_de_code , o.ord_date ord_date , a.act_code act_code , a.act_name act_name , o.ord_sts ord_sts , p.prod_name prod_name , d.prcs_rq_amt prcs_rq_amt , d.dev_date dev_date , d.dev_yn dev_yn , e.emp_code , e.emp_name , r.prcs_dir_sts FROM sales_ord o JOIN sales_ord_de d ON (o.ord_code = d.ord_code) JOIN com_prod p ON (d.prod_code = p.prod_code) JOIN com_act a ON (o.act_code = a.act_code) JOIN prcs_dir r ON (o.prcs_plan_code = r.prcs_plan_code) JOIN com_emp e ON (o.emp_code = e.emp_code) WHERE d.dev_yn = 'N' AND act_name LIKE '%' || #{actName} || '%' AND o.ord_sts = 'P2' AND prcs_dir_sts = 'P3' ORDER BY d.sales_ord_de_code DESC
